description.value:
Applied by a needle to the neck. For 1d5+1 hours gain +30 to Carouse and Toughness Tests to resist Toxins and Diseases. Afterwards gain 1 Fatigue unless taking another dose. Each time another dose is taken without 8 hours of rest between, make Toughness Test or sufffer -10 to Strength and Toughness Tests for 1 hour and take 1d5 Permenant Willpower Damage.

Effect: Average

Notes: 40 T
